column5: I find it is kind of sad.. when a well intended conversation quickly turns into the indecent and prejudice rules...  And when the local media and politicians will not take on the important issues. For fear of stirring up the hornets nest.  Unfortunately, not at all unexpected.  I do get tired of hearing the red-neck line.  It is so predictable.  And my meds are just fine...!!! I will try and behave myself in the future......  O.K. I am going to bed now and dream of catching a 60-inch musky....!  I need to relieve the stress!  the cap't  ouch...!
Bees nests need a good poking sometimes  Bonne nuit Kevin ....
P.M. sent Capt. sleep well.   Art
me so confused...time to start reading all the threads I guess. And here I thought a 60 inch musky was caught at Lakair
Watch for my post in about 4 weeks Roger
hahaha like you would post that Lew! You know that your 60 inch fish doesn't look any bigger than 58.
Sorry Lew - It will be caught on opening day.    I'll PM you the coordinates ...  maybe
Actually every muskie lew holds up looks like a 60"er to me. lol   Art
I've got very long arms Art
This year I have a photo of a 58-incher displayed in our Snakbar...!  There's the Lakair challenge...!
Just so it is not permanently mounted.
